name: horta - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: The Horta mirror was one of the new products that Ceccotti Collezioni presented at the 2017 Salone del Mobile in Milan. Designed by the CC studio, it is an accessory that underlines the importance the company places on environmental sustainability. Horta is made using wood from controlled and certified areas. With its mellow and elegant forms, it comes in a range of finishes and adds a discrete touch of elegance wherever it is used.
